_about_colors_hint: Shows MSDN reference page that shows every possible color codes in PocoHud3 preset
_about_hold_shift: Hold Shift to open in out-game browser.
_about_trans_presented: This English translation is presented to you by :
_desc_apply_and_reload: Some options will be applied on restart.
_desc_discard: Discard temporary changes and revert to previous settings
_desc_heist_may_not_match: * Numbers may not match between heists and days.
_desc_reset_category: Revert this category to the default settings.
_kit_color_edit_hint: Set this kit's vanity label color.
_kit_dblclick_to_equip: * Double click to load this setup
_kit_desc: * Kit profiler is dependent on your inventory setup. Any changes to your inventory will be applied to the result.
_kit_key_edit_hint3: key while out-game to equip this kit.
_kit_key_edit_hint4:
Custom key-combination not available.
Duplicated keybinds may have unexpected results.
(Only one kit can/will be equipped)
_kit_profiler_desc2: Double click to equip a kit setup
_kit_save_desc2: Save to the profiler. Unchecked items will be left as is.
_line_youAndCrewsPerks: Perks that you and your crew will benefit from
_opt_24HourClock_desc: Use 24 hour clock instead of 12 hour clock at the corner and bottom player infobox
_opt_blendMode_desc:
Sets blend mode for:
Buff's Icon
Arrows in menu
Damage Indicators

'Add' makes it transparent, 'Normal' option is not transparent
_opt_blockBloodDecals_desc:
Block blood decals from spawning when someone shoots someone

After disabling this option, a level restart is required to restore the default behavior
_opt_blockBulletDecals_desc:
Block bullet decals from spawning when someone shoots a wall/ground

After disabling this option, a level restart is required to restore the default behavior
_opt_blockCorpses_desc:
Blocks corpses after an enemy has been killed

After disabling this option, a level restart is required to restore the default behavior
_opt_blockHelmets_desc:
Blocks helmets from spawning from headshot kill or an explosion

After disabling this option, a level restart is required to restore the default behavior
_opt_blockMagazines_desc:
Blocks magazines from spawning after reload

After disabling this option, a level restart is required to restore the default behavior
_opt_blockShields_desc:
Blocks shields from lying on the ground (automatically despawned when 'Shield' special enemy died)

After disabling this option, a level restart is required to restore the default behavior
_opt_boostScale_desc:
Sets how big the boost icon will be (multiplier)

Depends on 'SHOW BOOST' option
_opt_buff_desc: Shows active buffs in real time
_opt_chat_desc_1: If an event listed below occurs and fulfills the set conditions, PocoHud will tell others via chat. Possible targets are:
_opt_chat_desc_3: * Only me: Only I can see it
_opt_chat_desc_4: * Everyone-Host: Tell everyone if I am the host
_opt_chat_desc_5: * Everyone-EM: Tell everyone if I have attended the entire match
_opt_chat_desc_6: * Everyone-Alone: Tell everyone if I am the only one who has PocoHud
_opt_colorizeCrimenet_desc: Color-code Crimenet contracts by difficulty and tone down heat bonus glow
_opt_colorNegative_desc:
Used in de-buff/bad things
(Ignored in "vanilla" style, applied after reloading PH)
_opt_colorPositive_desc:
Used in buff/good things
(Ignored in "vanilla" style, applied after reloading PH)
_opt_corner_desc: Static text ticker which works as FPS counter / outgame clock
_opt_corpseRagdollTimeout_desc:
Corpse ragdoll timeout in loud game.
Default is 3 seconds. Each step increase/decrease the time by 1 second.
_opt_detailedModeKey_desc:
Keybind for detailed (verbose) mode.
Default: ` (tilde key)
_opt_detailedModeToggle_desc: Allow toggling of detailed mode using the set key.
_opt_detailedOnly_desc: Hide corner text while detailed mode is not activated
_opt_dominated_desc: Show when an AI has cuffed himself
_opt_downedWarning_desc: Someone is downed more than twice in a row
_opt_drillAlmostDone_desc:
A drill has less than 10 seconds left.
* Requires Show Drills option enabled
_opt_drillDone_desc:
A drill is done.
* Requires Show Drills option enabled
_opt_duration_desc: Seconds. 0 means auto (follows shield recovery time)
_opt_fallbackToMe_desc: If an event is set to be sent to everyone but the condition is not fulfilled, show it to myself instead.
_opt_gainIndicator_desc: Display the amount of health and armor you gained from various sources.
_opt_handsUp_desc: Show when an AI is going to surrender
_opt_hit_desc: Arc that shows where you've been shot from
_opt_hostageChanged_desc:
Hostage count has been changed
* Not implemented
_opt_includeLocation_desc: If location data is available, include it in chat message.
_opt_ingameJoinRemaining_desc: In-game SOMEONE IS JOINING dialog will show you how many seconds left
_opt_interactionCircle_desc: Shows or hides interaction circle in buffs
_opt_interactionClickStick_desc: Aim down sight while interacting to initiate STICKY INTERACTION. ADS again to stop interacting.
_opt_maxFPS_desc: FPS cap on buff icons to reduce performance hit
_opt_messiah_desc: You consumed a pistol messiah shot
_opt_midstatAnnounce_desc: Announce stats on every X kills. Considered as 'Midgame stat'
_opt_nameLabel_desc: Configures how floating player name labels should look like
_opt_number_desc: Show the exact amount you lost
_opt_offset_desc: Vertical offset if you REALLY want to move it around
_opt_offsetX_desc: Horizontal offset if you REALLY want to move it around
_opt_playerBottom_desc: Info text at the bottom of the HUD
_opt_performance_desc: Enables or disables perfomance related boost
_opt_pocoRoseHalt_desc: Opening PocoRose would stop your movement
_opt_pocoRoseKey_desc:
Allows the player to shout commands to others.
Default: B
_opt_reduceShotgunSpam_desc:
Visually reduce shotgun spam
This is a just visual change and does not affect how shotguns will hit the target

After disabling this option, a level restart is required to restore the default values
_opt_rememberGadgetState_desc: Remembers gadget(laser, flashlight, angled sight) status between weapon swaps
_opt_replenished_desc: Someone replenished health by Medic Bag
_opt_replenishedFAK_desc: Someone replenished health by First Aid Kit
_opt_showAmmoEfficiencyStack_desc: Shows a gauge showing the current headshot count for the Ammo Efficiency skill
_opt_showAnarchistRegenGain_desc:
Determines whether an armor gain indicator for the Anarchist perk deck's passive armor regeneration should be shown
GAIN INDICATOR has to be enabled in order to work
_opt_showAIReviveCooldown_desc:
Show cooldown when AI inspires a player
For client, this has to be synced from host who has Poco
_opt_showArmorerInvulnerabilityCooldown_: Show cooldown duration when your armor breaks
_opt_blurBackground_desc: Blur the background of floating labels to increase readability.
_opt_showBikerCooldown_desc:
Shows Biker longest cooldown
This momentarily changes to show the shortest cooldown instead upon the kill count limit being hit
_opt_showBikerKillsGauge_desc:
Shows a gauge for current kill count
The gauge will turn red upon the kill count limit being hit
_opt_BikerKillsGaugeResolution_desc:
Sets how many times per second the polling function should run
Don't set it too high
Default is 2 times per second
_opt_showBloodthirstMeleeBoostGauge_desc: Show melee boost from Bloodthirst skill
_opt_showBulletstormPotential_desc: Determines whether a gauge showing the potential Bulletstorm duration should be shown while a Bulletstorm-enabled ammo bag is being targeted
_opt_BulletstormPotentialResolution_desc:
Sets how many times per second the polling function for potential Bulletstorm should run
The recheck function only runs when you are actively looking at the ammobag
Don't set it too high
Default is 4 times per second
_opt_showClock_desc: Put a clock after local player info
_opt_showConvertedEnemy_desc: Minion health as percent if one has any
_opt_showConvertedEnemy_desc2: Try to color-code them to the master.
_opt_showCriticalChanceGauge_desc:
Determines whether a gauge showing the current cumulative critical hit chance should be shown
(uses the Low Blow skill's icon)
_opt_DireNeedDurationResolution_desc:
Sets how often polls for the armor regeneration event
Don't set it too high
Default is 4 times per second
_opt_showDodgeChanceGauge_desc: Determines if Dodge Chance Gauge should be shown
_opt_showFirstAid_desc: Show 'Quick fix Aced' skill buff duration
_opt_showForcedFriendshipPercentage_desc:
Shows damage reduction in percent
SHOW FORCED FRIENDSHIP must be enabled to work
_opt_showForcedFriendshipStack_desc: Shows damage reduction you get from hostages
_opt_showGrinderStackCooldown_desc: Shows cooldown duration when Grinder can be activated again
_opt_showHackerPocketECMJammerJammerEffe: Show Pocket ECM Jammer Effect duration
_opt_showHackerPocketECMJammerFeedbackEf: Show feedback duration of the Pocket ECM Jammer
_opt_showHackerTemporaryDodge_desc: Show temporary dodge duration after killing an enemy with Hacker ability
_opt_showHighlighted_desc:
Show floating infobox while highlighted.
Pager answering timer also depends on this.
_opt_showHostages_desc: Show the number of hostages being held
_opt_showImmunity_desc: Show duration of the invulnerability when your armor breaks
_opt_showInspireReviveCooldown_desc: Show cooldown when you revive someone with Inspire
_opt_showInteraction_desc: Interaction timer that involves holding USE key
_opt_showLeechImmunityDuration_desc: Show immunity duration when Leech is active
_opt_showLevelAndInfamy_desc: Shows or hides Level and Infamy in name label
_opt_LockAndLoadResolution_desc:
Sets how many times per second the Lock & Load reload boost gauge should update
Don't set it too high
Default is 4 times per second
_opt_showManiacAccumulatedStacks_desc: Show a gauge showing the current accumulated Maniac stack
_opt_showManiacDecayTicks_desc: Show self-renewing timer for every subsequent Maniac stack decay
_opt_showManiacStackTicks_desc: Show self-renewing timer for every subsequent Maniac stack refresh
_opt_ManiacAccumulatedStacksResolution_d:
Sets how many times per second accumulated stacks should update
Don't set it too high
Default is 2 times per second
_opt_showMusicTitle_desc: Show title of the music when it is being set
_opt_showPersistentAnarchistRegenTick: SHOW ANARCHIST - PERSISTENT ARMOR REGEN DELAY
_opt_showPersistentAnarchistRegenTick_de:
The timer stays on your screen
SHOW ANARCHIST - ARMOR REGEN DELAY must be enabled to work
_opt_showPersistentDodgeChanceGauge_desc:
Dodge Chance Gauge will stay on your screen if chance is 0
SHOW DODGE CHANCE must be enabled to work
_opt_showRankInKickMenu_desc: In-game Kick menu will display player levels with their name
_opt_showRunningFromDeathMovementDuratio: SHOW RUNNING FROM DEATH - FASTER MOVEMENT DURATION
Show faster movement duration when you get revived
_opt_showRunningFromDeathWeaponDuration: SHOW RUNNING FROM DEATH - FASTER WEAPON SWAP/RELOAD DURATION
_opt_showRunningFromDeathWeaponDuration_: Show faster weapon swap/reload duration when you get revived
_opt_showSicarioTwitchGauge_desc: Show accumulated temporary dodge from Sicario's Twitch
_opt_showSixthSenseHighlighted_desc: Shows a number of highlighted units
_opt_showSuppressed_desc:
Suppression that prevents shield recovery and increases bullet deviation.
(Bullet deviation not in effect)
_opt_showSecondWind_desc: Show duration of Second Wind when your armor breaks
_opt_showSociopathCooldowns_desc:
Shows cooldown duration
Since all four kill perks share the exact same cooldown, only the most relevant one will be shown
_opt_showStoicDelayDamage_desc: Show duration of delayed damage with Stoic Perk Deck
_opt_showStoicHipFlaskCooldown_desc: Show cooldown duration of the Hip Flask in Stoic Perk Deck
_opt_showTagTeamTagged_desc: Show Tag Team ability duration when you are tagged
_opt_showTransition_desc: Transitions like weapon swap, melee cooldown
_opt_showUppersCooldown_desc: Show cooldown when you were auto-healed by FAK
_opt_showUppersRangeGauge_desc: Determines whether a gauge showing the distance to the nearest Uppers-enabled First Aid Kit should be shown
_opt_showUnseenStrikeCriticalBoostDurati: SHOW UNSEEN STRIKE - CRITICAL BOOST DURATION
Show duration when your crit gets boosted
_opt_showUnseenStrikeDamageAvoidanceDura: SHOW UNSEEN STRIKE - DAMAGE AVOIDANCE DURATION
Show duration of the damage avoidance
_opt_showUpYouGoDuration_desc: Shows skill duration when you get revived
_opt_shuffleMusic_desc: Shuffle game music between each assault waves
_opt_silentKitShortcut_desc: Ignore Kit Profiler shortcuts success message
_opt_simpleBusyIndicator_desc:
Replace 'busy' icons with simple red circle at the crosshair
Such as: Reloading, Weapon-swap, melee
_opt_simpleBusySize_desc: Set the size of the simple busy indicator
_opt_sortCrimenet_desc:
Sort Crimenet contracts by difficulty
Note: requires Align Crimenet to work as expected
_opt_truncateNames_desc: Truncate Player names by length, if required.
_opt_truncateTags_desc_1:
Truncate Player tags with square brakets.
e.g)
_opt_underneath_desc: Put PlayerBottom infobox at the very bottom of the screen
_opt_UppersRangeResolution_desc:
Sets how many times per second the polling function should run
Don't set this too high
Default is 4 times per second
_opt_xPosition_desc: Origin point X (% from left of screen)
_opt_yPosition_desc: Origin point Y (% from top of screen)
_tab_juke_shuffle_tip: * You can use auto shuffler via Options > General > Shuffle Music
_opt_showIncapacitations_desc: How many times player was downed by cloakers and tasers.
_opt_pocoRoseKey2_desc:
Allows the player to shout commands to others.
Default: N
_opt_onlyMe_desc:
Only show bottom infobox for you and not for other players.
This works for any bottom info set to 'Always'.
_opt_optionsMenuKey_desc: The key which opens this menu.
_opt_havePagers_desc:
A notification in the beginning of the heist in crime spree
about how many pagers can be answered (if stealth is possible).
_opt_haveCivilians_desc:
A notification in the beginning of the heist in crime spree
about how many civilians can be killed (if stealth is possible).
_opt_rankToPlaytime_desc: Replace level with playtime, if possible.
_opt_specOps_desc: Show a message when a key or a case from Spec Ops DLC was picked up.
_opt_showFpsBottom_desc: Shows your current frames per second rate.
_opt_offsetXTeam_desc: This only moves teammates' bottom infos.
_opt_textOnBuff_desc:
Shows text on buffs (time or percentage).
This does not affect vanilla buff style.
_opt_showTargetsTeamAi_desc: Show health of pointed team AI.
_opt_showTargetsDeployables_desc: Show info on pointed deployables (except sentry guns).
_opt_showTargetsOther_desc: Show health of pointed sentry guns, turrets and everything else.
_opt_showTargetsSpecials_desc: Show health of pointed special enemies.
